column2:
"I have been laughed at but at least I
think I have the guts to do it."

"Although I know the responsibilities
of defending the front line but
sometimes I wonder what exactly is
the right thing to do?"

"Well? Did I just look more senior-like
to you?"

"...cause no matter how good you are,
I will ALWAYS be your senior, alright?!"

"...but I would still like to thank you for
always being there."
